name: MONTANA, plaintiff, v. WYOMING and North Dakota.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
MONTANA, plaintiff,
v.
WYOMING and North Dakota.

opinions.text: Justice KAGAN took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion.
opinions.author: Justice KAGAN took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion.

attorneys: Final Motion of Special Master for Allowance of Fees and Disbursements granted and the Special Master is awarded a total of $51,984.57 for the period January 1, 2017 through January 10, 2018, to be paid equally by Montana and Wyoming. Barton H. Thompson, of Stanford, California, the Special Master in this case, is hereby discharged with the thanks of the Court.
casebody.head_matter:
MONTANA, plaintiff,
v.
WYOMING and North Dakota.
No. 137, Original.
Supreme Court of the United States
March 26, 2018.
Final Motion of Special Master for Allowance of Fees and Disbursements granted and the Special Master is awarded a total of $51,984.57 for the period January 1, 2017 through January 10, 2018, to be paid equally by Montana and Wyoming. Barton H. Thompson, of Stanford, California, the Special Master in this case, is hereby discharged with the thanks of the Court.
